title: Bimmer Watch Face - Moto 360
summary: Customizable watch face for Moto 360 for all BMW lovers.
developerAddress: 1700 Sofia, Prof. Georgi Bradistilov 6, fl. 4, Belvek Ltd.
description: We know you are a great *BMW fan*.Thtat's why we've prepared for you the ultimate watch face that will perfectly match your sheer driving pleasure.Adjust your watch just in seconds:★ FLAT background★ CARBON background★ Two AMBIENT LIGHT colors: -   RED-   BLUEFeatures:★ Time★ Date★ Day of week★ Battery indicator★ Used space indicatorGet it now and let's go for a ride!We appreciate your feedback!In case of any problems, please, contact us on: belvekltd@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
We know you are a great *BMW fan*.
Thtat's why we've prepared for you the ultimate watch face that will perfectly match your sheer driving pleasure.

Adjust your watch just in seconds:
★ FLAT background
★ CARBON background

★ Two AMBIENT LIGHT colors:
- RED
- BLUE

Features:
★ Time
★ Date
★ Day of week
★ Battery indicator
★ Used space indicator

Get it now and let's go for a ride!



We appreciate your feedback!
In case of any problems, please, contact us on: belvekltd@gmail.com
comments: The Best BMW watch face Looks awesome!  Was looking for a nice BMW watch face.. & I found the Best.. Like the "Ambient light " customisation options.. Also comes with background carbon /plain option.. Definitely recommend.. & Totally Worth it! Keep up the good work.. Looking forward to more updates & designs
Just got the 2nd gen moto 360 and it doesnt fit the watch face correctly
Nice watch face I have this watch face on my gear s 2 and it looks great. I just downloaded it for my moto 2nd Gen and it is not centered.
Moto 360 Looks sweet with white background light very nice
Doesnt fit moto 360 2nd gen Refunded because it doesn't fit... 2nd gen moto 360
